vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.11;
son of: Mehir (H4243);
father of: Beth-rapha (H1051), Paseah (H6454), Tehinnah (H8468)
§ Eshton = "effeminate"
a descendant of Caleb of tribe of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Mehír; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊施屯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "柔弱的"
猶大支派的人 (代上 4:11,12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伊施屯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "柔弱的"
犹大支派的人 (代上 4:11,12)
